items.title: Student loan system 'fair and reasonable', says Reeves
items.description: The chancellor's defence comes after Martin Lewis called her freeze on student loans "not a moral thing".

items.title: Israeli air strikes kill at least 28 Palestinians in Gaza, rescue officials say
items.description: Israel's military confirmed the strikes, which come during a ceasefire that Israel and Hamas accuse each other of breaking.

items.title: Latest Epstein revelations dig even deeper hole for Andrew
items.description: More unedifying pictures and words mean it doesn't get any better for Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor.

items.title: Watch: Frozen river hosts dance party in Kyiv
items.description: Residents in the Ukrainian capital are finding joy in unusual places, despite power cuts caused by Russian attacks and freezing winter temperatures.

items.title: Forest agree Ortega deal and target Inter's Frattesi
items.description: Nottingham Forest agree a deal for Manchester City goalkeeper Stefan Ortega worth up to Â£500,000.
